${ModID}:HoardQuest.TITLE: Amass a Hoard
${ModID}:HoardQuest.DESCRIPTION: Gather gold, so you have a hoard of #b500 gold or more!
${ModID}:HoardQuest.AUTHOR: JackRenoson

${ModID}:RainbowQuest.TITLE: Chase a Rainbow
${ModID}:RainbowQuest.AUTHOR: JackRenoson
EXTRA_TEXT: Upon pickup, obtain a #yQuestbound #yPrismatic #yShard. Add cards from #b

${ModID}:TreasureMapQuest.TITLE: Treasure Map
${ModID}:TreasureMapQuest.DESCRIPTION: You find a map pointing to a Rest Site later this Act. Go there to #yDig up some treasure!
${ModID}:TreasureMapQuest.AUTHOR: JackRenoson
TRACKER_TEXT: Go to the X-marked Rest Site

${ModID}:BoatRepairQuest.TITLE: Boat Repair
${ModID}:BoatRepairQuest.DESCRIPTION: You find a broken Boat. All it needs to work again is an #yAnchor, #yHorn #yCleat, and #yCaptains #yWheel. There are some markings on a map where you might find some, but they'll give less #yBlock until you gather them all.
${ModID}:BoatRepairQuest.AUTHOR: JackRenoson
